body:
You don't need to do this now.

In more details, we added a header `torch/csrc/utils/python_stub.h` which just declares `PyObject`. So now, most files which previously included a `Python.h` no longer do so, so it shouldn't be necessary to stick `Python.h` on a header unless it really truly is related to the Python binding code.
